Name: Rampart Tactics
About the game: Get ready for an exciting turn based strategy experience. Create squads from the eight different character classes and battle against AI opponents in the single player campaign, or challenge other players online via matchmaking. Customize your warriors with powerful weapon upgrades as you level them up, and equip them with 'runes'' that boost their stats and add other buffs. Watch the epic battles play out in this challenging indie strategy game!
Meta Title: Rampart Tactics: May 29, 2019, Aaron Saluk and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Rampart Tactics? Check out the release date (May 29, 2019), developer insights from Aaron Saluk, and a complete game summary.
